news.title: OpenAI launched ChatGPT Health
news.summary: OpenAI introduced a health-focused ChatGPT experience with connected health data and privacy-focused controls.

news.title: OpenAI announced OpenAI for Healthcare
news.summary: OpenAI introduced enterprise healthcare offerings focused on secure deployment and operational workflow support.

news.title: OpenAI opened applications for Grove
news.summary: OpenAI launched Grove applications to support technical founders building AI products and agent-driven tools.

news.title: Anthropic targeted $10B raise at $350B valuation
news.summary: Reuters reported Anthropic planned a major funding round, signaling continued capital intensity in frontier AI competition.

news.title: xAI announced major new funding
news.summary: CNBC reported xAI raised a large new round, reinforcing the pace of funding escalation across model developers.

news.title: Capex expectations remained central investor theme
news.summary: CNBC market coverage highlighted AI infrastructure spend as a top valuation driver entering 2026 earnings season.

news.title: AMD unveiled MI455 AI processors at CES
news.summary: Reuters reported AMD revealed higher-performance MI455 accelerators aimed at data-center AI workloads.

news.title: Nvidia said next-gen chips were in full production
news.summary: Reuters reported Nvidia confirmed next-generation AI chip platform production momentum at CES.

news.title: EU officials pushed legal steps on Grok imagery
news.summary: Reuters reported growing European regulatory pressure on AI-generated harmful imagery and enforcement expectations.
